reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and powerful
reviews.reviewText: This charges my phone faster than my older more bulky portable charger. Love this size and ease of use! No cord needed once it is charged!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small charger that is reliable
reviews.reviewText: The charger is a nice sturdy design for iPhones. It is light weight and rigid and has a good capacity. Fully charge an iPhone 12 and the best part it has pass through charging. It has a lighting port on one side and a usbc on the other . I just plug this into my lighting cable and then into my phone at night. They are both charged by the morning time and I can unplug it and take both .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size, but takes a while to charge
reviews.reviewText: I've personally used this power bank and can attest to its convenience. Blending my experience with a summary of other customer reviews, here's what stands out:Pros:- Ease of Use & Portability: It's lightweight and compact, making it easy to carry in a bag or pocket. Perfect for travel, it takes up minimal space.- Built-In Cord: Comes with its own cord for charging, adding to the convenience.- Fast Charging: Despite its small size, it delivers quick and reliable charging.- Durability: Withstands daily use without signs of wear and tear.- Battery Life: Efficiently maintains charge, capable of recharging a phone multiple times.- No Additional Cables Needed: Directly attaches to the phone, eliminating the need for extra cables.Cons:- Charging Time: Some users noted it takes a bit longer to charge itself.- Not Fully Charging Some Devices: A few users mentioned it doesn't completely charge newer iPhone models.- Fragility: There are reports of it breaking if dropped.- Limited Charging Cable Length: The included charging cable could be longer for more convenience.- Longevity Concerns: A user reported it became less effective after a few months.Summary:This power bank is a great blend of portability, ease of use, and efficiency. It's particularly handy for travelers or those constantly on the go. The built-in cord and fast charging are significant plus points. However, consider its slower self-charging time, potential durability issues, and limitations in fully charging some newer phone models. Overall, it's a practical choice for keeping your devices powered up while on the move.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the picture
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First of all I love the color it’s exactly like the foto. I charged my phone with it to check out its potential and its very good! It charged my phone more than 30% in like such short time. I’m not gonna say the amount of time it took because I honestly don’t remember but 15 minutos sounds about right. Please get this I’m using it for school and traveling and I will buy again in the future in a different color for my sister. Thank you so muchhhhhh this is amazinggggggggggUpdate: Stopped working😭 I’m so sadddd. One day I wanted to use it, it had been in my bag for only like a couple days I don’t think it was a week yet (without using the product, I had it longer than that but I had never not used it for like a week) and when I was at school and had to charge my phone it didn’t want to charge. I left it in for a couple minutes but nothing happened till like later I heard the noise and saw that it started charging my phone. But, then it stopped working again like it didn’t even charge for 5 minutes I don’t understand what happened. What a waste of money, and my family is going through a hard time with money and my mom had let me buy it so now I have a product that my mom spent money on that does not work and hella bills of other things that we have to pay. Do your research before buying, I hope they can reach out or something so that I can get a new product sent but this one will have to go in the trash or something (I might keep it for a bit to see) but I have had it for like a month without it working so I don’t think the problem will fix itself. Read reviews before purchasing and hopefully this doesn’t happen to others. I really liked the product at first when it was working well, I’m so sad this had to happen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It charges really fast. It’s great to carry around with you. Everytime i go out, I take it with me in case I’m low on battery. Has not failed me yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent little power bank! Charges my phone quickly—the tradeoff it that it loses its own charge fairly fast also but it’s great backup for a day out when I won’t be able to plug in my phone until evening. Because of its weight and the design of the bit that plugs into the phone I’m always half-afraid it’s about to fall out but it hasn’t yet so that’s a personal problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fast charger but uses all the charging power when charging phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extra battery power on the go
reviews.reviewText: Super handy and once I realized that it worked on my iPhone 14 Pro Max I bought one for my car and another for home. I use my phone for a lot of outdoor activities like birdwatching so being able to extend my time outside and not worry about a dead phone in the middle of nowhere is great.
Little heavy but charhes quick, so I'm happy
Excellente Batterie, je l'ai jusqu'à ce jours. Une fois chargé à 100% permet de charger son téléphone en cas de Batterie faible à l'extérieur cela m'a été très indispensable lors de longues sorties.

reviews.reviewTitle: Grande capacité pour cette batterie externe et grande longévité
reviews.reviewText: Très satisfaite du fonctionnement.C’est une batterie ultra compact, elle est assez petite, le tout pour une grande capacité de puissance !Le chargement est vraiment très rapide, c’est un accessoire indispensable que l’on peut emporter partout, et l’avoir toujours avec soi pour recharger en urgence la batterie de son tel, et surtout pour ne pas se retrouver en panne 😉On apprécie tout particulièrement le capuchon en plastique du chargeur qui protège l’embout lors du transport dans son sac sa sacoche ou dans son sac à main. Ce qui permet de ne pas l’abîmer.Le poids est tout à fait convenable, pas très lourd, pratique pour le transport.De plus, cette batterie externe est extrêmement facile à utiliser, elle est même livré avec sa notice d’utilisation écrite en plusieurs langues.Aucune surchauffe, très bon fonctionnement, je ne peux plus m’en passer ! Je recommande donc tout particulièrement son utilisation et son achat car très bon rapport qualité prix.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un powerbank portatile e poco ingombrante per iPhone
reviews.reviewText: Personalmente ho sempre utilizzato powerbank più capaci e ingombranti, ma questo piccolo e funzionale caricatore d'emergenza è una piacevole scoperta. La sua caratteristica principale è la possibilità di attaccare direttamente il powerbank all'iPhone senza nessun cavo aggiuntivo. Basta inserire direttamente il telefono nella porta di ricarica, anche senza dover rimuovere la custodia, se quest'ultima non è troppo ingombrante. Questo è un grande vantaggio, perché consente di utilizzare il telefono in modo normale mentre si ricarica, eliminando la necessità di maneggiare cavi ingombranti.Il peso leggero rende questo powerbank estremamente portatile, ideale per chi è in movimento. Puoi portare il tuo telefono ovunque senza preoccuparti della durata della batteria.Le due porte di ingresso e uscita, inclusa una porta lightning, consentono una carica rapida. La capacità di 5200 mAh è sufficiente per caricare l'iPhone più di una volta, a seconda del modello. Inoltre, come indicato dalle specifiche, il powerbank è conforme agli standard internazionali di sicurezza per il trasporto aereo, il che significa che è possibile portarlo a bordo durante i viaggi. La confezione include oltre al powerbank, un cavo USB di tipo C e un manuale utente.Tuttavia, ho assegnato 4 stelle anziché 5 perché manca un display che mostri la percentuale residua di batteria. Questa è una funzionalità utile che avrei apprezzato avere per monitorare con precisione quanto rimane di carica nel powerbank. In ogni caso, è comunque una scelta eccellente per chi cerca un powerbank portatile e poco ingombrante.

No pesa mucho y es más cómodo que llevar una batería externa con un cable. El color es muy bonito y elegante. Recomendado 100%. Lo puedes llevar en cualquier lado por el tamaño. Instrucciones en todos los idiomas
